properties.title: Chamonna Tuoi CAS
properties.description: Located at the foot of Piz Buin in Val Tuoi close to the village of Guarda, the popular and modern cabin offers a wide range of ski mountaineering and snowshoe tours in winter. Mountain hikers and families appreciate the envrions of the cabin, cabin-to-cabin hikes and fairly easy high mountain tours. Mountain bike trails with a view of the Engadine Dolomites and a single trail complete the range of possibilities.
